mapper.select: SELECT ms.mile_no, m.mile_name, SUM(CASE WHEN ms.user_no = #{userNo} THEN ms.mile_score_point ELSE 0 END) AS user_point, m.mile_max, SUM(ms.mile_score_point) AS all_point, ms.mile_score_date AS mile_date FROM mile_score ms JOIN mileage m ON ms.mile_no = m.mile_no GROUP BY ms.mile_no, m.mile_max, ms.mile_score_date;
